events.message: The customer reported a car accident involving a collision with another vehicle at an intersection during heavy rain.
The insurance team reviewed the initial claim details and categorized this case under Auto Accident for further processing.
An experienced claims agent has been assigned to the case to handle communication and investigation.
The customer received an acknowledgment email confirming receipt of the claim and next steps.
The claims department requested the customer to submit a copy of the police report and photos of the damaged vehicle.
The customer provided all requested documents including the police report, damage photos, and insurance card copies.
The claims agent has initiated an investigation to verify the circumstances of the accident and liability.
The investigation concluded that the other driver was at fault in the collision and verified damages reported.
A settlement offer for vehicle repairs and associated costs was proposed to the customer based on the investigation.
The customer responded positively, expressing appreciation for prompt processing and clear communication.
The claim was approved by the insurance management with the agreed settlement terms finalized.
Payment for the approved settlement amount was issued to the customer's bank account as per policy terms.
The claim was officially closed after all payments were processed and no pending actions remain.
All case documents and communications have been archived for record keeping and future reference.
